posts.postText: IT's Happening Alot Now I Dont Know What It Is But Its Lagging Heaps For Everyone
Vasto found out who it was an banned the guy. After that the lags stopped.
Why do people have such a hard on for attacking jail?

>> Why do people have such a hard on for attacking jail? 
People get jealous that we have the best server and want theirs to be the best.

i think jailbreak is a pretty cool guy. eh gets donations and doesnt afraid of anything
I hope the DDOSING doesnt start again

>> Ben":31qh4yto]>> Why do people have such a hard on for attacking jail? 
People get jealous that we have the best server and want theirs to be the best. 

Either that, or its just noobs who even rage at games like GMOD. like SERIOUSLY, I can understand Cod, but Gmod? really? This game has to be extrememly laid back, and anyone who would DDoS a gmod server is just trying to get attention, or just doesn't like it when he sucks at the game so has to attempt to ruin it for everyone else. Then, at the failed DDoS by a 9 year old kid, he probably rages even more and gets a video of him put up on youtube of him shoving a remote up his ass.

>> Vasto found out who it was an banned the guy. After that the lags stopped. 
If this is true, it was not a DDoS, and was probably just a coincidence.

>> And thus we become ethnocentrists. 
Well by definition, it does fall into the category of ethnocentrism, I would not really refer to it as ethnocentrism, given the nature of what we believe is the best.
It's like if you were calling someone ethnocentric because they believed that their local baseball team was the best.
By definition, is it ethnocentric? Yes.
Would anyone REALLY consider it ethnocentric? Probably Not.
